title: CBDT Releases Draft Income Tax Rules & Forms, 2026 for Public Feedback
content:
# CBDT Releases Draft Income Tax Rules & Forms, 2026 for Public Feedback

Ek important update hai! The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) ne Draft Income-tax Rules, 2026 aur Forms ko public consultation ke liye announce kiya hai. Ye new rules, Income-tax Act, 2025 ke saath, April 1, 2026 se effective honge.

Yahan kuch key details hain:

*   **Purpose:** These draft rules and forms aim to simplify tax compliance, reduce litigation, and ease the compliance burden, replacing the existing Income-tax Rules, 1962.
*   **Consultation Period:** Stakeholders aur general public 22 February, 2026 tak apne comments aur suggestions submit kar sakte hain.
*   **Key Changes:** The number of rules has been significantly reduced from 511 to 333, and forms from 399 to 190, making the process more streamlined.
*   **Feedback Categories:** Inputs are specifically invited on four broad areas: simplification of language, reduction of litigation, reduction of compliance burden, and identification of redundant or obsolete rules and forms.
*   **Submission Mechanism:** Comments can be submitted through a dedicated utility launched on the e-filing portal (eportal.incometax.gov.in), which has been live since February 4, 2026.
